item.description:
Looking for a great way to end the week...or begin the weekend??? Join us this Friday at Ludal's in North Haven for their very special Happy Hour!

Enjoy mouthwatering apps for 1/2 price with the purchase of a drink (from 4 to 6:30pm). Check out this menu...http://ludalct.com/page/4998-Pastas-and-Entrees We want to celebrate spring. What better way than with good friends and food. Seriously, this food is fantastic! Make sure you thank Rhoda!!! 

So come on out and have a bite...a drink...a laugh!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or Rhoda...Cell is 203-808-5829
